languages.text: {n}Идира начинает хихикать при словах Иеронимуса.{/n} "Забыл, забыл таких, как я... сколько живу — столько и слышу, что я грязь на лике Человечества, отрава его, погибель..." {n}Женщина всхлипывает и резко обрывает сама себя.{/n}

{n}Idira starts giggling at Hieronymus's words.{/n} "He forgot to mention people like me... My whole life people have told me I'm filth on the face of Humanity, its poison, its bane..." {n}She stops abruptly with a sob.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Идира начинает хихикать при словах Иеронимуса.{/n} "Забыл, забыл таких, как я... сколько живу — столько и слышу, что я грязь на лике Человечества, отрава его, погибель..." {n}Женщина всхлипывает и резко обрывает сама себя.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira starts giggling at Hieronymus's words.{/n} "He sure forgot to mention people like me... My whole life people have told me I'm filth on the face of Humanity, its poison, its bane..." {n}She sobs, then sneers.{/n} "All of them pious dogs can go to the void! I serve House von Valancius, not your Emperor, and it suits me just fine."

{n}Idira starts giggling at Hieronymus's words.{/n} "He sure forgot to mention people like me... My whole life people have told me I'm filth on the face of Humanity, its poison, its bane..." {n}She sobs, then sneers.{/n} "All of them pious dogs can go to the void! I serve House von Valancius, not your Emperor, and it suits me just fine."

{n}Idira starts giggling at Hieronymus's words.{/n} "He forgot to mention people like me... My whole life people have told me I'm filth on the face of Humanity, its poison, its bane..." {n}She stops abruptly with a sob.{/n}

{n}Idira starts giggling at Hieronymus's words.{/n} "He forgot to mention people like me... My whole life people have told me I'm filth on the face of Humanity, its poison, its bane..." {n}She stops abruptly with a sob.{/n}

{n}Idira starts giggling at Hieronymus's words.{/n} "He forgot to mention people like me... My whole life people have told me I'm filth on the face of Humanity, its poison, its bane..." {n}She stops abruptly with a sob.{/n}

languages.text: {n}听到希罗尼穆斯的话之后，伊迪拉咯咯笑了起来。{/n}“他忘记提到像我这样的人了……从我生下来的那一刻起，人们就说我是人类的污点，是毒药，是祸根……”{n}她突然住了口，啜泣起来。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Idira starts giggling at Hieronymus's words.{/n} "He forgot to mention people like me... My whole life people have told me I'm filth on the face of Humanity, its poison, its bane..." {n}She stops abruptly with a sob.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}听到希罗尼穆斯的话之后，伊迪拉咯咯笑了起来。{/n}“他忘记提到像我这样的人了……从我生下来的那一刻起，人们就说我是人类的污点，是毒药，是祸根……”{n}她啜泣着，随后冷笑起来。{/n}“让这些道貌岸让的畜生都滚到虚空里去吧！我侍奉的是冯·瓦兰修斯家族，不是你们的什么帝皇。这挺适合我的。”

languages.text: {n}Idira suelta una carcajada al escuchar a Hieronymus.{/n} «Se ha olvidado de mencionar a gente como yo... Toda mi vida me han dicho que soy mugre a ojos de la Humanidad, que soy su veneno, su perdición...». {n}Se detiene repentinamente y solloza.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Idira starts giggling at Hieronymus's words.{/n} "He forgot to mention people like me... My whole life people have told me I'm filth on the face of Humanity, its poison, its bane..." {n}She stops abruptly with a sob.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira suelta una carcajada al escuchar a Hieronymus.{/n} «Se ha olvidado de mencionar a gente como yo... Toda mi vida me han dicho que soy mugre a ojos de la Humanidad, que soy su veneno, su perdición...». {n}Solloza antes de desdeñar.{/n} «¡Que se pudra en el vacío esa escoria! Yo sirvo a la casa von Valancius, no a su Emperador, y eso es lo único que quiero».

languages.text: {n}イディラはヒエロニムスの言葉を聞いてクスクスと笑い始めた。{/n}「あたいたちのような存在にのことは忘れてるみたいね…これまでの人生で、あたいは人々から人類の汚物であり、毒であり、災いだと言われてきた…」{n}さめざめと泣いていたはずの彼女は突然泣き止む。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Idira starts giggling at Hieronymus's words.{/n} "He forgot to mention people like me... My whole life people have told me I'm filth on the face of Humanity, its poison, its bane..." {n}She stops abruptly with a sob.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}イディラはヒエロニムスの言葉を聞いてクスクスと笑い始めた。{/n}「あたいたちのような存在にのことは忘れてるみたいね…これまでの人生で、あたいは人々から人類の汚物であり、毒であり、災いだと言われてきた…」{n}さめざめと泣いていたはずの彼女は突然泣き止む。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Idira fängt bei Hieronymus' Worten an zu kichern.{/n} "Er hat Leute wie mich vergessen ... Mir wurde mein ganzes Leben lang gesagt, ich sei Schmutz auf dem Antlitz der Menschheit, ihr Gift, ihr Verderben ..." {n}Plötzlich hält sie schluchzend inne.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Idira starts giggling at Hieronymus's words.{/n} "He forgot to mention people like me... My whole life people have told me I'm filth on the face of Humanity, its poison, its bane..." {n}She stops abruptly with a sob.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira fängt bei Hieronymus' Worten an zu kichern.{/n} "Er hat Leute wie mich vergessen ... Mir wurde mein ganzes Leben lang gesagt, ich sei Schmutz auf dem Antlitz der Menschheit, ihr Gift, ihr Verderben ..." {n}Sie schluchzt und zischt dann:{/n} "Diese ganzen frommen Hunde sollen doch in die Leere gehen! Ich diene dem Haus von Valancius, nicht dem Imperator, und genauso will ich es."

languages.text: {n}Idira se met à rire en entendant les mots de Hiéronymus.{/n} « Il oublie de mentionner les gens comme moi... Depuis toute petite, les gens me répètent que je suis une pustule sur le visage de l'humanité, un poison, un fléau... » {n}Elle éclate en sanglots.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Idira starts giggling at Hieronymus's words.{/n} "He forgot to mention people like me... My whole life people have told me I'm filth on the face of Humanity, its poison, its bane..." {n}She stops abruptly with a sob.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira se met à rire en entendant les mots de Hiéronymus.{/n} « Il oublie de mentionner les gens comme moi... Depuis toute petite, les gens me répètent que je suis une pustule sur le visage de l'humanité, un poison, un fléau... » {n}Elle éclate en sanglots, avant de ricaner.{/n} « Tous ces chiens dévots peuvent bien disparaître dans le néant ! Je suis au service de la maison von Valancius, pas de votre Empereur, et ça me va très bien comme ça. »

languages.text: {n}İdira, Hieronymus'un sözlerine gülmeye başlıyor.{/n} "Benim gibileri söylemeyi unuttu. Hayatım boyunca herkes bana İnsanlığın yüz karası, zehri, vebası olduğumu söyledi." {n}Aniden hıhlayarak duruyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Idira starts giggling at Hieronymus's words.{/n} "He forgot to mention people like me... My whole life people have told me I'm filth on the face of Humanity, its poison, its bane..." {n}She stops abruptly with a sob.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}İdira, Hieronymus'un sözlerine gülmeye başlıyor.{/n} "Benim gibileri söylemeyi unuttu. Hayatım boyunca herkes bana İnsanlık için bir leke, bir zehir, bir felaket olduğumu söyledi." {n}Aniden hıçkırarak duruyor.{/n}
